title: EP 44: Social Media Trends and Tips
itunes:title: EP 44: Social Media Trends and Tips
description:
In this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur podcast, Steve talks about social media trends, where it's going and some tips. Making and following the plan, the importance of consistency, taking action today and so much more.

 

“Make a plan, follow the plan, be consistent... But for any of those other things to matter, you need to take action today.”

   - Steve Schabacker

 

How To Get Involved:

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

 

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

 

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
